constituent: highness, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, compare, spoon, sitting on the ground, soil, dirt, ground, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
heisigStory: This key word indicates a title of address to royalty. Its elements: pinnacle . . . compare . . . ground.
koohiiStory1: Your highness is the pinnacle of finesse compared to all of us commoners who are but like dirt on the ground.
koohiiStory2: His Highness, the main man at the Pinnacle, often compares those who live outside the city´s walls to dirt.
